text: Paul Thomas Adam Shepstone (born 8 November 1970) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for Blackburn Rovers and York City, in the Scottish Football League for Motherwell, in non-League football for Atherstone United, Stafford Rangers and Wycombe Wanderers, and was on the books of Coventry City and Birmingham City without making a league appearance. He earned one cap for the England national youth team in 1989. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Coventry Category:English footballers Category:England youth international footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Coventry City F.C. players Category:Birmingham City F.C. players Category:Atherstone Town F.C. players Category:Blackburn Rovers F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Motherwell F.C. players Category:Stafford Rangers F.C. players Category:Wycombe Wanderers F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Scottish Football League players
title: Paul Shepstone
